content:
Sorry if this has been asked before, but has anyone tackled flagging Encounters in FHIR as Self Pay without extending the Resource? I've been looking through the Standard to see a spot where an encounter could be denoted with this information and haven't had much luck. I'm interested in labeling these encounters where a patient paid out of pocket for the services to establish Access Controls to who can see resources associated to this encounter.

Thanks
Encounter has a reference to Account, which is where you describe that an encounter was covered under a self-pay arrangement
